title: Best La Paz hotels with in-room jacuzzis
excerpt: Finding hotels in La Paz with in-room jacuzzis can be a daunting task, as the options are often scattered and not widely advertised. This curated list not only saves you time but also highlights the best spots where you can unwind in luxury after a day of exploring the vibrant city. With these recommendations, you can elevate your travel experience by indulging in the ultimate comfort right in your own suite.
intro: Discover the top hotels in La Paz that offer the perfect blend of luxury and relaxation with in-room jacuzzis.

hotels.name: Suites Camino Real
hotels.description: Suites Camino Real, located in the lively Calacoto district of La Paz, offers luxurious suites with private bathrooms, seating areas, and convenient amenities like minibars and coffee machines. Guests can unwind in the renovated indoor pool and whirlpool, or rejuvenate at the on-site gym and spa. The hotel's La Tranquera Restaurant delights with a variety of local and international dishes, featuring a breakfast buffet with freshly baked Bolivian pastries, making it the perfect getaway for relaxation and culinary exploration.

Enjoy chic rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and a range of wellness amenities, including a spa and heated pool with breathtaking city views. Indulge in exquisite regional cuisine at two on-site restaurants and take advantage of convenient services, making your La Paz getaway truly unforgettable.

Conveniently located near major Teleferico Stations, the hotel also offers free WiFi, airport transfers, and a delightful restaurant for a truly enjoyable stay.

With an on-site restaurant serving a delightful mix of international and local cuisine, and convenient access to nearby attractions, your stay promises both comfort and adventure.
